sentences.en: A fish nibbles at the bait.
sentences.cn: 一条鱼在轻轻地啃鱼饵.

sentences.en: A fish snapped at the bait.
sentences.cn: 鱼咬住饵了.

sentences.en: Ah Q would rise to the bait as usual, and glare furiously.
sentences.cn: 阿Q照例地发了怒, 他怒目而视了.

sentences.en: He baited his hook with pie.
sentences.cn: 他把馅饼放在钓钩上作饵。

sentences.en: He used maggots as live bait.
sentences.cn: 他用蛆当活诱饵.

sentences.en: I felt a nibble at the bait.
sentences.cn: 我感到(有鱼)轻咬一下饵.

sentences.en: Service stations use petrol as a bait to lure motorists into the restaurants and other facilities.
sentences.cn: 加油站以汽油为诱饵，吸引开车的人用餐以及使用其他设施。

sentences.en: Television programmes are essentially bait to attract an audience for advertisements.
sentences.cn: 从根本上说，电视节目就是吸引观众看广告的诱饵。

sentences.en: The boys dug pits and baited them so that they could spear their prey.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们挖了陷阱，在里面放上诱饵，以便用矛刺杀猎物。

sentences.en: The fish took the bait.
sentences.cn: 鱼咬了钓饵。

sentences.en: The fish took the bait.
sentences.cn: 鱼吞饵了.

sentences.en: The fish wouldn’t take the bait .
sentences.cn: 鱼儿不上钩。

sentences.en: The fish wouldn’t take the bait.
sentences.cn: 鱼儿不上钩。

sentences.en: They are too knowing to bite at such a bait.
sentences.cn: 他们很老练,不上这种当.

sentences.en: They bait the mousetrap with stale cheese.
sentences.cn: 他们用变质的乳酪作捕鼠夹的诱饵.

sentences.en: They were digging up worms to use for bait.
sentences.cn: 他们正在挖蚯蚓作鱼饵.

sentences.en: This type of trap uses no bait or other attractant.
sentences.cn: 这种陷阱不用诱饵或其他引诱物。

sentences.en: We used worms as bait.
sentences.cn: 我们用小虫子作诱饵。

sentences.en: When she attempts to make you feel guilty, don't take the bait.
sentences.cn: 如果她试图让你觉得内疚，不要上当。

sentences.en: Why do you blame me? You'swallowed his bait " of your own accord.
sentences.cn: 你为什么怪我? 你是太公钓鱼,愿者上钩.

phrases.tran_cn: (北美， 非正式)要么全力以赴要么索性放弃

trans.tran_en: food used to attract fish, animals, or birds so that you can catch them
to deliberately try to make someone angry by criticizing them, using rude names etc
to put bait on a hook to catch fish or in a trap to catch animals
